html: As the founder and co-chair of the Childhood Cancer Caucus, I know immunotherapy treatments will greatly improve outcomes for our children. This less invasive method can limit the life-long health consequences our pediatric survivors currently face stemming from their treatment.
text: As the founder and co-chair of the Childhood Cancer Caucus, I know immunotherapy treatments will greatly improve outcomes for our children. This less invasive method can limit the life-long health consequences our pediatric survivors currently face stemming from their treatment.

html: Congratulations to Dr. Allison and Dr. Honjo on the @NobelPrize for your work on immunotherapy treatments. This breakthrough allows us to use our body’s own defenses to destroy the cancer cells. Advances in this field will continue to revolutionize the way we treat cancer.
